text: The house of Pala. Karuppaiah, who was recently expelled from AIADMK, was attacked on Friday, police sources said. Around 11 p.m., a few unknown assailants attacked his house located on Besant Road, Royapettah, sources added. The assailants came in an auto and damaged his Innova car. Police who immediately rushed to the spot said they would soon register a case with regard to the incident. Further investigation is on.
title: Pala. Karuppiah’s house attacked
